name: 2.02.7.3. Use Skill
content:
@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.OiNttXSDW598DIEs]{(Index) Combat Rules}

@Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.VZCpOrg3jCyNaYeg]{2.02. Actions in Combat}

  • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.n3ejDpqIKzKy97TU]{2.02.7. Miscellaneous Actions}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.3GeZw8nK6Zjs2qvC]{2.02.7.1. Take 5-Foot Step}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.PHjZollV2EfO7rAa]{2.02.7.2. Use Feat}
    • @Compendium[pf-content.pf-rules.pIDiwty0LLzlVhru]{2.02.7.3. Use Skill}

Source PRPG Core Rulebook pg. 189

Most skill uses are standard actions, but some might be move actions, full-round actions, free actions, or something else entirely.

 

The individual skill descriptions in Chapter 4 tell you what sorts of actions are required to perform skills.
